```adblock
rezka.bid#$#body > div.wrapper { padding-top: 0 !important; }
rezka.bid##div[class^="top-right"]
```

comment.body:
Unfortunately MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
Until then, please add following rules:
```adblock
coempregos.com.br,anitube.us,anitube.vip,hinatasoul.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-setTimeout', '/hasAdblock|detectadb|ad-placement/')
coempregos.com.br,anitube.us,anitube.vip,hinatasoul.com#$#.wrap-player > #player { display: block !important; }
coempregos.com.br,anitube.us,anitube.vip,hinatasoul.com#%#//scriptlet('adjust-setTimeout', 'PLAYER LIBERADO', '*', '0.001')
drstonebr.com,animefire.info,animesonliner4.com,coempregos.com.br,anitube.us,dattebayo-br.com,anitube.vip,hinatasoul.comssstik.io#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', '//cdn.taboola.com/libtrc/unpkg/tfa.js')
```
to user rules.

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint-cli from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint-cli](https://github.com/igorshubovych/markdownlint-cli) from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0.
Release notes

Sourced from markdownlint-cli's releases.

v0.45.0

  • Update markdownlint dependency to 0.38.0
    • Add MD059/descriptive-link-text
    • Improve MD025/MD027/MD036/MD038/MD041/MD043/MD045/MD051/MD052
    • Remove support for end-of-life Node version 18
  • Update all dependencies via Dependabot
Commits
  • 192ad82 Bump version 0.45.0
  • f6225d2 Bump nano-spawn from 0.2.0 to 1.0.1
  • 1b8554a Add released Node version 24 to CI workflow.
  • 836379f Remove optional constant fs.R_OK
  • 1a19ddb Bump minimatch from 9.0.5 to 10.0.1
  • 5033e1e Pass newly-required markdownItFactory option to markdownlint.
  • b7e47f8 Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0
  • c3fa9f5 Bump glob from 10.4.5 to 11.0.2
  • b983f61 Remove support for end-of-life Node.js version 18.
  • 8878ef0 Bump ignore from 7.0.3 to 7.0.4
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint-cli&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.44.0&new-version=0.45.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: lma.npaw.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

Version: 1.0.24.94

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.francetv.pluzz

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. On NVidia Shield using FranceTV app (French TV named FranceTV - website francetv.fr) videos are stuck on loading with this url blocked **lma.npaw.com**.
My Nvidia Shield is using my local AdguardHome (version 0.107.61) as DNS server and I only use AdGuard DNS filter (default filter) as blocklist.
If I add this domain in allowed domain, the video loads correctly.

2. Screenshots
Screenshot seems irrelevant in this case because the screen stays black with a rolling circle in the middle of the screen.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

Version: 1.0.24.94

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.francetv.pluzz

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. On NVidia Shield using FranceTV app (French TV named FranceTV - website francetv.fr) videos are stuck on loading with this url blocked **lma.npaw.com**.
My Nvidia Shield is using my local AdguardHome (version 0.107.61) as DNS server and I only use AdGuard DNS filter (default filter) as blocklist.
If I add this domain in allowed domain, the video loads correctly.

2. Screenshots
Screenshot seems irrelevant in this case because the screen stays black with a rolling circle in the middle of the screen.


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
>On my end it's the same without blocking, looks like a site issue.

The same on my end.

<hr>

As a workaround, this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Multimedia.ImageDetailUtils.chab', 'noopFunc')
```
seems to works fine for me, but as it's a website issue then it rather should not be added to filters.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint-cli from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint-cli](https://github.com/igorshubovych/markdownlint-cli) from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0.
Release notes

Sourced from markdownlint-cli's releases.

v0.45.0

  • Update markdownlint dependency to 0.38.0
    • Add MD059/descriptive-link-text
    • Improve MD025/MD027/MD036/MD038/MD041/MD043/MD045/MD051/MD052
    • Remove support for end-of-life Node version 18
  • Update all dependencies via Dependabot
Commits
  • 192ad82 Bump version 0.45.0
  • f6225d2 Bump nano-spawn from 0.2.0 to 1.0.1
  • 1b8554a Add released Node version 24 to CI workflow.
  • 836379f Remove optional constant fs.R_OK
  • 1a19ddb Bump minimatch from 9.0.5 to 10.0.1
  • 5033e1e Pass newly-required markdownItFactory option to markdownlint.
  • b7e47f8 Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0
  • c3fa9f5 Bump glob from 10.4.5 to 11.0.2
  • b983f61 Remove support for end-of-life Node.js version 18.
  • 8878ef0 Bump ignore from 7.0.3 to 7.0.4
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint-cli&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.44.0&new-version=0.45.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in ChineseFilter (specific.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are duplicate rules in the filters.

- [ ] .gif$third-party,domain=
- [ ] ||sinaimg.cn^$domain=
- [ ] ||z4a.net^$domain=
- [ ] ##.advert
- [ ] ##.ad-container

### Proposed solution

Merge or remove rules if possible.

comment.body:
The regex works if I use like this:

```adblock
^https:\/\/[a-z][a-z][a-z][a-z][a-z][a-z][a-z][a-z]+\.com\/en\/([a-z][a-z]+\/)?([a-z][a-z]+\/)?[a-z][a-z]+\?/$script,third-party,match-case
```

but as soon as I add `([a-z]+=[^&=?\s]*?&)*`, it doesn't work.
